TopUp.title: How do I pay?
TopUp.ques2: Insert the address in your wallet or on the exchange
TopUp.ques3: Enter at least 0.2 TON for the transfer
TopUp.ques5: Be sure to specify MEMO, otherwise your funds will be lost!
TopUp.p1: Ensure that the correct address and number of TON tokens are entered
TopUp.p2: The transfer will be processed on the blockchain, which can take a few minutes to complete
TopUp.warn1: Send only TON to this address
TopUp.info1: Please note, a 0.1 TON fee applies to all deposits.
TopUp.info2: Also, be sure to specify MEMO or the funds will be lost.
TopUp.with: Withdrawal is available only to TON-address. Transfer to other accounts is not possible.
